Question: Moadata Co. LTD CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Moadata Co. LTD

HEALTHKETCH, AI based digital healthcare system

- Personalized digital healthcare system using multi-modal artificial intelligence-based anomaly detection technology
- Collects and analyzes health information through National Health Insurance Service API and national comprehensive health checkup data
- Integrates real-time biometric information from smart rings and bands for health notifications and management
- Provides health guides and information for improved health and wellness
